version_description:
1.6.3

- Bug fixes and stability improvements


1.6.2

- Video playback fix
- Small fix to reinstate wind speed


1.6.1 

- All weather locations are back 

1.6 

- iPhone 5 compatibility 
- Retina graphics 
- Fixed video playing bugs 
- Made more content available 
- iOS6 Facebook and Twitter integration

We’re always working to improve the STV News app. This update will make our live blogs work better and fix a few bugs. Future releases will add great new features so switch on automatic updates to ensure you always have the latest version. If there is anything you would like to see, drop us a line at enquiries@stv.tv, @stvnews on Twitter or facebook.com/stvnews. We’d love to talk to you.

Now with faster breaking news notifications. We've been hard at work making the STV News app even better. A lot of the work is under the bonnet, but it's all focused on improving your experience. Use auto update to make sure you never miss the new stuff.
